idea:
Independent is a fashion company divided into two sections manufacturing clothes and customization. The

consumer can share their design with us and we produce it for them. A platform for fashionistas to bestow

their talent and earn with it. The designs are available on the website where the designer will earn a profit

on each sell.

Independent is hunting for new fashionistas to create a space in the fashion industry with new fashion

ideas. Independent differentiate itself by marketing strategies, exclusiveness and high brand awareness.

Independent aims to solve queries about clothing. Independent will stitch the perfect piece for all the body

types.
name: INDEPENDENT FASHION LLP

idea:
EdificeVR is the leading software for immersive design review and collaboration in virtual reality. It is used by BIM and VDC teams, design firms, and engineers who coordinate 3D models and implement design and construction processes. Because EdificeVR integrates with Revit, Rhino, SketchUp, and other 3D tools out of the box, you can instantly create an immersive VR experience that allows you to present to clients and work more effectively with your team.

EdificeVR offers a desktop product called “Simulate” that works with the HTC Vive and Oculus Rift, as well as a mobile product called “Companion” that is compatible with the Samsung GearVR, Google Daydream, and Cardboard.
name: AEDIFICIUM TECHNOLOGIES LLP

idea:
ASDM Legal is the brainchild of a group of law enthusiasts coming together, driven by a motive to impart knowledge and unfold stories in a way no one else does. The organization is established with an objective to give people that one bit of insight that they have always strived for. What makes us different? Our experiences to overcome failures. We have been through this and we have known the driving factors and that is the reason why ASDM LEGAL strives to bridge the gap between all the opportunities and the students. It tries to encourage students from different walks of life to grow and excel mutually even if they are not from renowned universities.


Our team is a collection of students, academicians and professionals with specialization in various fields. We visualize a world where anyone, anywhere can build skills by accessing the best learning experience - on their devices at the tip of their fingers.
name: ASDM LEGAL

idea: My startup is about style garments. Sometimes what we wear becomes out style statement. To start our journey we are going to launch our online portal for printed T-shirts.

idea: glamsham.com started as a Bollywood content portal. Currently growing into a general entertainment & lifestyle portal and ultimately aim to become a super-portal catering to the entertainment & lifestyle industry as a one-stop-shop for all types of products, services and platform under one brand.

idea:
The aim of establishing Outfox Media Groupe LLP has always been to create something, which will stand out of the clutter. Our endeavor is to establish a brand, which is paramount to excellence and reliability. We have our headquarters based out of Mumbai.

We are a one-stop Marketing and Business solution provider for all startups and corporates. We help the startups to build their brand and the established companies to grow their business. We are a new age marketing agency that aims to create events and experiences that will inspire and transform. We partner with brands to build marketing campaigns with a 360-degree approach and events, which take their brand a notch higher.

We are one of the most promising agencies for Marketing, Digital Marketing, Social Media, Ad film/Video production and have a service portfolio covering all aspects of today’s ever increasing marketing requirements.

We help the businesses to generate revenue, generate employment, build awareness, build partnership, and expand volume, so as to build or redefine their brand.

We are a team of ideates, communicators, designers, planners, researchers, developers and visionaries. We serve in the sectors like Media & Entertainment, Health sector, Retail, Real Estate, Manufacturing, Life sciences, education, Energy & Utilities, Professional Services, Hi-Tech etc.
name: OUTFOX MEDIA GROUPE LLP

idea: Mauka is an Ed-Tech platform that aims at imparting essential employability skills thus making students or people seeking opportunities more job-ready.
name: MAUKA EDUCATION PRIVATE LIMITED
